value:
Midgard is the realm of mortals. As a
goddess of Vanaheimr, it is my duty
to serve as your guiding light.

Vanaheimr, the realm of light, realm
of gods, beautiful and shining... It is
ruled by Njörðr, king of the vanir.

Are my garments so unusual?
Perhaps they are, from a mortal
perspective... Hm.

You mustn't lie to a goddess. Only
mortals who are true of heart can
receive a goddess's blessing.

Vanaheimr, the realm of light, and
Ásgarðr, the celestial realm, are both
realms of the gods.$k$pThe two realms are in no way
allied, however—or even on
friendly terms.

My greetings to you, child of
Midgard. I am Seiðr of Vanaheimr,
the realm of light.$k$p...Might you also be able to point
the way back to where I've just
come from, please?

Oh! Hoora— Erm... As is to be
expected from a goddess such
as myself.

Witness the power of a goddess
of Vanaheimr.
Oh no... The shame...

Thank you. What a sweet mortal
you are.

I am Seiðr of Vanaheimr, the realm
of light. May all the children of
Midgard receive light's blessing.

I have granted you revelation, and
in doing so have chosen you as the
mortal destined to stand beside me.$k$pTogether, we will save this world.$k$pI am sorry I was unable to ask you
whether this path is one you would
choose, but my hand was forced.$k$pAs a goddess, I promise you that,
should you be righteous and true,
you will receive my blessing.$k$pWe goddesses have honored this
arrangement since time immemorial...$k$pWhatever it is that you desire—be it
gold, silver, or any other treasure—it
will be yours. You have my word.
There is hope yet!
I must keep going!
Revealing light!
You can stop this!
Heið, I only wanted...
Child of Midgard, I am known as Seiðr of Vanaheimr, the realm of light.
*yelp* You...startle a goddess so brazenly? I will not forget this...
With my light, I have given you a gift of revelation—a vision of the future.
So long as we never give up, our wishes will one day be made reality. I truly believe that.
Heiðr is no less than a sister to me... She is dearer than any other.
There are ways a goddess must act, and ways she must not...
It is no small thing for a goddess to give the gift of revelation... Of course, it was bound to happen.
Without a doubt.
Pressing ever forward!
The future is in sight.
